extendedInfo.description: Ready!? Rush!SongRush is a musical arcade game that will allow you to play with your own music. Run, slide, jump and avoid all the obstacles. Beat your own music by pulling off perfect combos to win maximum points. Will you get to the end of your track?Try all the solo challenges and take on your friends in the weekly tournament.May the best rusher win!- Download songs and play with your own library!- The obstacles are generated randomly by an algorithm. Each game level is unique!- A graffiti-inspired urban graphics style with a musical twist- Challenge your friends with the weekly tournament ------------------------------------ CURIOUS? More info on: bulkypix.com facebook.com/Bulkypix twitter.com/Bulkypix youtube.com/Bulkypix

reviews.title: Fun but needs improvement
reviews.comment: Very enjoyable and would recommend to anyone who enjoys music. Also I\'d like to mention the fact I have a song with no obstacles. Wondering when that will be fixed. Was curious if it was due to the fact the song was over 6min.
reviews.author: Kemal Weisdorfer

reviews.title: Love the concept!
reviews.comment: Good game but controls on my phone don\'t feel tight or actuate compared to other games the song idea is great needs to be able to add more then one song at a time character customisation is another really great and welcome add more the back ground feels alittle dull and boring after 10 runs could use some attention but really decent game and nice concept I hate the cost for playing a song tho that\'s really weak five stars because I know these devs with updates will make this game worth it came here from DL
reviews.author: Ellis Colon

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: Keep it up. But the slide button is kinda slow
reviews.author: Derrick Harris

reviews.title: Great game
reviews.comment: It\'s just that controls aren\'t fluid or accurate, and some obstacles are impossible to avoid, they\'re too close to each other. Progress bar is just a pixel thin. Also I don\'t die or loose score when I hit some obstacles. No background music. Great game, needs fixes and more stuff. Keep it up!
reviews.author: deveerei respondo

reviews.title: Good, but I would like to see this
reviews.comment: - Multiple song import - The ability to customize the character  - A progress bar for each song  - Powerups  - Other obstacles related to the song genre
reviews.author: Gonzalo Barril

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: Good
reviews.author: Anh Tuan

reviews.title: Excelent
reviews.comment: Add and change backgound music at the menu
reviews.author: Alvin Christian

reviews.title: Great time killer...but...
reviews.comment: it\'s very fun but the gameplay isn\'t entirely accurate you guys really need to fix that, and you\'ll get your five stars you deserve.
reviews.author: jaylen hinton

reviews.title: Needs a lot of work!
reviews.comment: This game has no gameplay. Good idea but bad realization. 5 stars for future improvements.
reviews.author: Alessandro Vashchuk

reviews.title: Good but
reviews.comment: Its an awesome game but I can\'t use files from My Cloud Player For Soundcloud

reviews.comment: Great

reviews.comment: Nice

reviews.comment: G
reviews.author: Aj Garcia

reviews.comment: sucks
reviews.author: Vector Equilibrium

reviews.comment: Awesome game but $60 buck fon unlimited play!?!?!? Fix the prices and I will buy.
reviews.author: Jean Lausell

reviews.title: Fun game, but....
reviews.comment: This is a really good idea, and I always check out something they will bring my music into the game. None of my songs will import, not even one. I would love it if you fixed this, also being able to add more than one song at a time, because I have about 200 songs or so. The obstacles and stuff can also be off beat, and rarely, when I try to jump it will roll me, and vice versa.
reviews.author: Hunter Stephens

reviews.title: Great game but...
reviews.comment: Its a great game, but the gameplay is very straight forward, just slide and jump and no more. I wish there are power ups along the way, or anything that will make the gameplay more varied. But it\'s still an enjoyable game.
reviews.author: Jearom Roxas

reviews.title: Interesting concept, okay execution
reviews.comment: A fairly generic runner game. Redeemed by the interesting mechanic of the custom music. Would be nice if future updates added rolling terrain (hills and valleys) in time with the music and/or terrain at various levels. Anything to make it more than sliding and jumping across straight line.   Also, if it\'s possible to ease/streamline adding music from Google Play Music, that\'d be awesome.   Also, I\'d rather pay $1-2 instead of this annoying tokens system.
reviews.author: Travis Wolfenberger

reviews.title: Too Expensive!
reviews.comment: The game is fun, but it can get expensive. Every song you play costs a coin, which you can buy with in game points, but if you don\'t have enough, it can get very expensive. It is especially expensive with the unlimited play option. I can buy the new call of duty for 60 bucks! Why would I spend that on an Android app! Please lower the prices SEVERELY! Android apps are simply not that valuable!
reviews.author: David Williams

reviews.title: Bof
reviews.comment: beaucoup trop dur en plus qu\'on jump ou qulon slide on se prend quand meme les objets Oo bref c\'est fait expres pour nous faire payer mais le concept reste cependant pas mal du tout
reviews.author: Alex fr
